house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1988 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio.
house_listing.firm_name: Century 21 Academy Associates Century 21 Academy Associates

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dining/Living Combo, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener,Ranch Style
